description:
Shinobu wants to join clubs, such as the ping-pong club, lacrosse club, sepak takraw etc., but none of the clubs she likes exist. So in the end, she joins her friend, Makoto, in joining the kendo club. She is impatient and ill-mannered, but her attitude is better than her brother`s. Her mother gave her her brother`s gear.
Source: wiki
name: Toyama Shinobu
